metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0486 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Knot DNS before 1.5.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) via a crafted DNS message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0486` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

knot - 1.5.2-1
knot-dnsutils - 1.5.2-1
knot-host - 1.5.2-1
libdnssec4 - 1.5.2-1
libknot6 - 1.5.2-1
libzscanner1 - 1.5.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: knot package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-1').
